name: Zenysis
headline: Building powerful data analysis software for developing countries.
description: Zenysis builds data integration software that helps governments view and analyze all their data in one place. When governments face pandemic emergencies, humanitarian crises, or natural disasters, they turn to their data for actionable insights. Zenysis puts this information at their fingertips.

Harness the lifesaving power of data with Zenysis
Our next-generation technology helps health systems unleash the full power of their data to improve lives at scale.
[Who we are](http://www.zenysis.com/<https:/www.zenysis.com/about-zenysis/>) [What we do](http://www.zenysis.com/<https:/www.zenysis.com/solution/platform/>)
Introducing Harmony
Harmony is our open-sourced advanced analytics platform. It rapidly integrates data from any number of siloed information systems into a single, easy-to-use workspace. The fusion of these data sources within Harmony unlocks powerful insights that equip decision-makers to transform health systems and programs.
[![Harmony logo](http://www.zenysis.com)](http://www.zenysis.com/<https:/www.zenysis.com/solution/platform/>)
[LEARN MORE](http://www.zenysis.com/<https:/www.zenysis.com/solution/platform/>) [Features](http://www.zenysis.com/<https:/www.zenysis.com/solution/platform-features/>)
Our Platform
Open Source
Harmony has met the [Digital Public Goods Alliance](http://www.zenysis.com/<https:/digitalpublicgoods.net/registry/harmony.html>)‘s DPG Standard and is listed in their registry. This distinction acknowledges Harmony as an open source solution under the GNU General Public License v3 (GPL v3) and affirms its status as a digital public good.
Effortless Data Integration
Harmony integrates data from your existing data systems without requiring any changes to those systems, ensuring a smooth and efficient implementation process.
Rapid Harmonization
Harmonization capabilities allow you to combine the most granular data from your existing systems for advanced analysis and unlock a wealth of new insights into program performance.
Flexible Analysis & Reporting
Harmony features over 20 easy-to-understand visualization options, customizable for various needs and audiences. Automatically-updating dashboards and reports ensure decision makers have timely access to the latest information.
Improved Data Quality
Harmony allows you to quickly identify and address data quality issues, offering easily read data quality scores and other assistive features that help you address data quality issues in a targeted way.
Integrated Data Warehousing
Harmony’s integrated data warehouse, built on the open-source Druid database, consolidates data from diverse sources into a single, high-performance repository to support analytics, reporting, and actionable insights.
Our Approach to Data Driven Impact
Zenysis blends cutting-edge technology with a proven implementation model customized to your needs and context. We deploy teams of multi-disciplinary specialists – engineers, public health practitioners, and data experts – who provide data-driven support across the lifespan of the partnership, from development to training and sustainability. We work at your side to mount fast, effective responses that transform health systems.
  * Discover
  * Design
  * Deliver
  * Sustain

[How we work](http://www.zenysis.com/<https:/www.zenysis.com/solution/services/>)
Where We Work
Zenysis is a global technology partner that works with governments, innovators, and development funders across four continents to deliver better health outcomes for all. 
United StatesBrazilLiberiaRwanda EthiopiaMozambique ZambiaTanzaniaSouth AfricaVietnam Pakistan Guinea-Bissau
Close
BETTER HEALTHCARE FOR EVERYONE, EVERYWHERE
Governments, nonprofits and international organizations use our technology to tackle some of the most pressing global health challenges of our time. 
[Our Impact](http://www.zenysis.com/<https:/www.zenysis.com/impact/#impact-stories>)
Partner With Us
We believe in the power of partnerships. We work with governments, global organizations and grassroots implementers to transform their use of data for decision making and action. Discover how we can work together to shape a healthier, more resilient world.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Zenysis**

**Mission:** Zenysis is dedicated to building powerful data analysis software specifically designed to aid developing countries. By integrating data seamlessly, they empower governments to analyze critical information at a moment’s notice, especially during pandemics, humanitarian crises, and natural disasters.

**Origins:** Initially focused on data integration, Zenysis developed tools that consolidate governmental data into an accessible platform. This allows decision-makers to glean actionable insights quickly.

**History:** Founded in 2016 and a proud participant in Y Combinator’s Winter 2016 batch, Zenysis was established to meet the pressing data needs of global health systems.

**Team & Location:** Operating out of San Francisco with a compact team of 11, Zenysis combines technological expertise with a passionate commitment to social impact, under the guidance of Group Partner Michael Seibel.

**What They Do:** Zenysis has rolled out “Harmony,” an open-source advanced analytics platform that brings disparate data from various systems into one user-friendly workspace. Here’s what makes Harmony stand out:
- **Effortless Integration:** Integrates smoothly with existing data systems, necessitating no alterations.
- **Harmonization:** Merges granular data for improved insights into health programs.
- **Flexible Reporting:** Features more than 20 visualization options, ensuring reports cater to diverse stakeholders.
- **Data Quality:** Users can swiftly pinpoint and rectify data issues using built-in quality metrics.
- **Integrated Data Warehouse:** Powers high-performance analytics through a consolidated repository of information.

**Global Reach:** Zenysis collaborates with governments and organizations across four continents, including the U.S., Brazil, and various African nations, aiming to enhance health outcomes universally. The company’s partnerships with nonprofits and international organizations reflect their belief in the transformative potential of data-driven decision-making.

**Impact Focus:** From public health authorities to grassroots implementers, Zenysis’s technology addresses some of the globe's most urgent health challenges.

**Website:** For more information about their solutions and impact, check out [Zenysis.com](http://www.zenysis.com).

In a nutshell, Zenysis is not just about data integration; it’s about forging a healthier, more resilient world through the strategic use of data.
